text: 40|5|jhuthalaaya inase poorv, noohî€¼ kee jaati ne tatha bahut-se samudaayon ne unake pashchaat tatha vichaar kiya pratyek samudaay ne apane rasool ko bandee bana lene ka tatha vivaad kiya asaty ke sahaare, taaki asaty bana den saty ko. to hamane unhen pakad liya. phir kaisee rahee hamaaree yaatana
